title: Are there any areas in Wilmington where ATT\'s Uverse is available and do they plan on switching from DSL to Uverse anytime soon?  (The lines in my neighborhood have been in service over 30 years and we are constantly having problems with phone and DSL service due to cracks in the lines from age and weather.  ATT has done little to improve their service and I am considering changing carriers but would like to know if they are planning to offer Uverse before I drop them.)
text: AT&T tells us problems with Uverse have been cleared up now.
